Error\nOops!! some unknown error has occurred. can\'t play the audio file
The track will be removed shortly. Oops! It seems there was an error while trying to remove the track.
Warning\nYou are about to delete %d files permanently. This cannot be undone. Click Delete or the message will cancel itself.
Error Status Uncertain Oops! An error occurred while deleting audio files
A dialog is about to be shown. please confirm to delete the files
The deleting of files was cancelled by the user.
Success\n The %1$s/%2$s files from the storage have been successfully deleted.
You are about to add %1$s to the blacklist. You can unblock it later from the settings. This message will be automatically cancelled if you do not wish to proceed.
%1$s has been added to the blacklist. To unblock, go to the settings and remove it from there.
No third-party or built-in equalizer found. Please download a third-party equalizer from the market to enhance your audio experience.
Please note that adding to queue is an experimental feature and it may not work properly when shuffle mode is on.
The playing queue will be cleared shortly.
Add to queue\nThe items are either in the queue already or some error has occurred while adding.
Add to queue\n%d/%d item has been successfully added to the playlist. Enjoy your music!
Add to queue\n%d/%d items have been successfully added to the playlist. Enjoy your music!
Alert\n An update has just been downloaded. The app is already updated to the latest version. Error\nAn error occurred while adding/removing the item to favourite playlist Upgrade to the Pro version to unlock this feature.
App Theme
Select the app theme: dark, light, or follow the system settings.
System Bars Enable tranparent system bars for an edge-to-edge experience \n(Android 6.0+)
Immersive View Activate to hide the status and navigation bars for a seamless, full-screen experience.
Minimum track length
Tracks shorter than this duration (in seconds) will not be added to the library.
Recent playlist size
Define the maximum number of tracks to keep in the playlist history.
Stop Playback
Terminate playback service when the app is removed from the recent tasks list.
Audio Effects Switch between in-built or 3rd party audio effects.\nTurn Off in-built effects manually if using 3rd party app.
Fetch artwork from MediaStore
Faster artwork loading times, but there is a possibility of displaying incorrect artwork.\n Changing this setting requires restarting the app.
Enable trash can
Only available on Android 11 and above, when enabled, deleted tracks are moved to a Trash Can folder instead of being permanently deleted.
Blacklist
Tracks from the blacklist folders will be hidden from your library.
Enable gapless playback
When enabled, there will be no gaps or pauses between tracks during playback.
Crossfade time
The duration (in seconds) of cross fading effect between tracks during playback.
Feedback
Have feedback? We\'d love to hear it, but please don\'t share sensitive information.
Thank you for using &appname; . I am an individual developer who loves to create useful and beautiful apps. I need your support to keep developing this app and make it better. You can support me by buying the app or rating it 5 stars on the store. Your feedback is also very valuable to me. Please share your thoughts and suggestions with me. I appreciate your help and encouragement.
Rate Us
If you enjoy using &appname;, please take a moment and rate it 5 stars on app store. Thanks for your support \nTap to rate.
Spread the word
We appreciate your support for the app. If you love it, please share it with your friends, family and WhatsApp groups. Remember, sharing is caring!
"v%1$s by &author;"

Storage\nPermission
This app lets you enjoy audio files from your device’s storage. To do that, it needs your permission to access your storage
